ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Weapons on Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah. I think only player character are effected by the delay. Bc I ve had orcs swing 4 times in the time I could swing once and my delay was half the delay
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah. I think only player character are effected by the delay. Bc I've had
orcs swing 4 times in the time I could swing once and my delay was half the
delay ont he weapons they were holding.
The EQ people sure did a good job in wieghing things in the favor of the
npcs.
luv,
-Su

> That reminds me....I've heard that pet's have a static delay time when
> swinging...
>
> If this is true...then wouldn't it be great to hand your pet a weighted
axe?
> 50 dam 150 delay ( i think these are the stats )
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Nygaardr, FC3 [SMTP:nygaardr@...]

> > Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Strategies
> >

> >
> > Mu

battle

not

too
